column2: "Na wɔdze Nyankopɔn adakaa no bae
column3: na wɔdze besii asese a David abɔ ama no no ne finimfin: na wɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na aber a David wiee ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr bɔ no
column3: ɔdze EWURADZE ne dzin hyiraa ɔman no."

column2: "Na ɔkyɛɛ Israelnyi biara adze
column3: ɔbarimba na ɔbaa nyina
column6: na esikyireamba a wɔabɔ no etɔw."

column2: "Na oyii Levifo no bi sisii hɔ dɛ wɔnsom wɔ EWURADZE n'adakaa no enyim
column3: na wɔnkamfo EWURADZE
column5: na wɔnda no ase na wonyi no ayɛw:"

column2: "Asaf nye otsitsir
column3: na Zekaria dzi no do hɔ
column12: wɔdzedze bɛnta asanku ɔnye nsankutsen; na Asaf dze akasaa a ɔgyegye kɛse:"

column2: "na Benaia na Jahaziel asɔfo no a wɔhɛn ntotorobɛnto daa
column3: wɔ Nyankopɔn n'ahyɛmudaka no enyim."

column2: "Da no ara na David dzii kan hyehyɛɛ dɛ wondua Asaf na no nuanom nsa do nda EWURADZE ase."
"Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE
column3: hom mbɔ ne dzin; Hom mma wonhu ne nyɛe wɔ aman mu."

column2: "Hom ntow ndwom mma no
column3: hom ntow ayɛyindwom mma no; Hom nka n'anwanwa dwuma nyinara ho asɛm."

column2: "Hom nhyehyɛ homho wɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no mu: Wɔmma hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE hɔn akoma ntɔ mu."
"Hom nhwehwɛ EWURADZE na n'ahoɔdzen; Hom mbra n'enyim daa."
"Hom nkaa n'anwanwa dwuma a ɔayɛ; N'ahobowdze
column3: na n'ano atsɛmbusɛm;"

column2: "Hom n'akowaa Israel asefo
column3: Hom Jakobmba a wɔasan mu eyi hom."

column2: "Ɔno nye EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn; N'atsɛmbusɛm wɔ asaase nyinara do."
"Hom nkaa n'ahyɛmu no daa
column3: Asɛm a ɔhyɛe maa mbasantsen apem no;"

column2: "Ahyɛmu a ɔnye Abraham dzii no
column3: Na ne ntam a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Isaak no;"

column2: "Na osii no pi maa Jakob dɛ ahyɛdze
column3: Ɔdze maa Israel dɛ daa ahyɛmu no:"

column2: "Dɛ
column3: Ɔwo na medze Keenan asaase mebɛma wo
column4: Hom tontotwe no do egyapadze nye no."

column2: "Aber a hom nyimpadodow ano nndɔɔ so; Nyew
column3: wosuar koraa
column4: na wɔyɛ amamforafo wɔ mu no;"

column2: "Na wokyinkyinii fi ɔman mu kɔr ɔman mu
column3: Na wofii ahenman kor mu kɔr ɔman kor so mu."

column2: "Ɔamma nyimpa bi kwan ma ɔannyɛ hɔn bɔn; Nyew
column3: otwuuw ahemfo enyim wɔ hɔn ntsi;"

column2: "Dɛ
column3: Mma hom nka hɔn a masera hɔn
column4: Na mma hom nnyɛ mo nkɔnhyɛfo bɔn bi."

column2: "Asaase nyinara
column3: hom ntow ndwom mma EWURADZE; Hom nkyerɛ no nkwagye mfi da nto da."

column2: "Hom nka n'enyimnyam wɔ amanaman mu
column3: N'anwanwa dwuma wɔ aman nyinara mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE yɛ kɛse
column3: na ɔsɛ dɛ woyi no ayɛw dɛ: Ɔno so na ɔsɛ dɛ wosuro no sen enyame nyinara."

column2: "Na aman enyame nyinara yɛ abosom: Na EWURADZE na ɔyɛɛ ɔsor."
"Enyidzi na tumdzi wɔ n'enyim: Ahoɔdzen na enyika wɔ ne tsenabew."
"Aman mbusuakuw
column3: hom mma EWURADZE
column4: Hom mma EWURADZE enyimnyam na ahoɔdzen."

column2: "Hom mma EWURADZE enyimnyam a ɔsɛ ne dzin: Hom mfa ayɛyɛdze mbra
column3: na hom mbra n'enyim: Hom nsɔr EWURADZE wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ ahoɔfɛw mu."

column2: "Asaase nyinara
column3: hom ho mpopo wɔ n'enyim: Wiadze so woetsim no dɛ wohim no a ɔnnkɛyɛ."

column2: "Wɔmma ɔsor enyi ngye
column3: na asaase ho nsɛpɛw no: Na wɔnka no wɔ amanaman mu dɛ

column2: "Wɔmma po
column3: na ne mayɛ nwor; Wɔmma haban
column4: na dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara ndzi ehurusi;"

column2: "Nna kwaa mu ndua nyinara bɔtow ahosɛpɛw ndwom wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: Na ɔreba ebobu asaase atsɛn."

column2: "Hom mfa ndaase mma EWURADZE; na oye: Na n'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa."
"Na hom nse dɛ
column3: Gye hɛn nkwa
column5: Na boaboa hɛn ano na yi hɛn fi amanaman mu
column6: Na yɛnda wo dzin krɔnkrɔn no ase

column2: "Nhyira nka EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn
column4: Mfi daapem nkesi daapem. Na ɔman no nyinara see dɛ

column2: "Nna ogyaa Asaf na no nuanom hɔ
column3: wɔ EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no enyim
column4: dɛ wɔnsom wɔ adaka no enyim daa
column5: dɛ mbrɛ da biara no mu edwuma gye:"

column2: "na Obed-edom nye hɔn nuanom
column3: yɛ eduosia awɔtwe: Jedutun ne ba Obed-edom so na Hosa dɛ wɔnyɛ mbobowano ahwɛfo:"

column2: "na ogyaa ɔsɔfo Zadok
column3: na no nuanom asɔfo no
column4: wɔ EWURADZE ntamadan no enyim wɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm a ɔwɔ Gibeon no mu
column6: "dɛ wɔmbɔ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE wɔ ɔhyew afɔrmbukyia no do daa anapa na ewimbir
column7: mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ EWURADZE ne mbra a ɔhyɛɛ Israel no mu nyinara tse;"

column2: "na Heman na Jedutun ka hɔn ho
column3: na nkaa a wɔsaan mu yii hɔn a wɔbobɔɔ hɔn dzin

column2: "na Heman na Jedutun ka hɔn ho dze ntotorobɛnto na nkasaa a ɔgyegye kɛse
column3: na ɔnye Nyankopɔn ndwom ho ndzɛmba: na Jedutun mba dɛ wɔnhwɛ kuropon ano."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara sii mu kɔree
column3: nyimpa biara kɔr ne fie: na David sanee kɔr dɛ orikehyira ne fi."
